longInfo:
Passport required. 
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  on arrival.
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a Macao (SAR China) Travel Permit. 

Visa required, except for Holders of Hong Kong (SAR China) or
Macao (SAR China) passports. 
Visa required, except for Holders of a multiple entry UK visa
(valid for at least 6 months)
